.. _`pcs_admin_standard_proposal_program`:

.. index:: Catalogs
.. index:: Proposal Classes
.. index:: Application Development
.. index:: Customizing

Proposal Classes for Use in Catalogs
####################################

|cs.pcs| supports the :ref:`ce_admin_en:catalog_proposals_standard` of the |cs.platform| for the following business objects:

.. list-table:: Proposal Classes for Use in Catalogs
   :widths: 35 40
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Business Object
     - Name of the proposal class
   * - Project
     - pcs_project_proposals
   * - Project Template
     - pcs_project_template_proposals
   * - Task
     - pcs_task_proposals

If you are developing an application or customizing an installation, we strongly recommend that you use these
proposal classes in your catalogs.
